name: SPAN d.d.
description:
Span is a provider of wide range of IT services and solutions in the segments of Software Asset Management and Licensing, Infrastructure Services, Cloud and Cyber Security, Service Center Management and Technical Support, and Software and Business Solutions Development.

In 30 years of business, Span has developed from an IT system integrator in Croatia to a Group that operates on the international market, where it generates two thirds of its revenues.

As an IT service provider, Span successfully follows and responds to trends in the digital transformation of the operation, and with its work and company values, it strives to be an example of the responsible and sustainable business.

You can find more information about Span and important events at the following link: www.span.eu/en/investors/.
